news.title: Sales of €1m-plus homes soar across Ireland as US buyers swoop in
news.summary: Sales of €1m-plus luxury homes across Ireland have surged dramatically amid ongoing supply shortages, continued demand, increasing prices and the ­impact of overseas buyers.

news.title: Ireland back in Trump’s crosshairs as he promises ‘substantial tariffs’ on countries who ‘attack’ American tech companies
news.summary: US president Donald Trump has said he will impose "substantial additional tariffs” on countries regulating American big tech firms, in a move that could have implications for Ireland.

news.title: Fianna Fáil MEP Billy Kelleher refuses to rule out Áras run – as former Dublin manager Jim Gavin ‘has Taoiseach’s backing’
news.summary: Fianna Fáil MEP Billy Kelleher has not ruled himself out from a run at the presidency.

news.title: ‘We think our old neighbour is grazing his cattle on our vacant family farm and we’re worried he could claim squatter’s rights. What can we do?’
news.summary: Query:  Dear Mary Frances, my brother and I are the joint owners of farm in the south of the country, and we have a problem with a neighbour who we think is trespassing.

news.title: Seamus Coleman left out of Ireland squad for World Cup double header as Ogbene and Bazunu return
news.summary: Seámus Coleman has been left out of the Ireland squad for next month’s opening World Cup qualifying double-header, as Heimir Hallgrimsson named his 23-man squad this morning.

news.title: Fionnán Sheahan: Jim Gavin is a proven winner on big stage but Billy Kelleher is a disruptor in Fianna Fáil presidency saga
news.summary: Jim McGuinness is the only manager to have beaten Jim Gavin in the All-Ireland football championship.

news.title: VHI to hike premiums in blow to more than 1.2m customers
news.summary: A third health insurer has announced plans to hike its premiums in a move that is set to pile pressure on family budgets.

news.title: Israelis protest after IDF strike on hospital kills at least 20 people as more Palestinians flee Gaza City
news.summary: More Palestinian families left Gaza City on Tuesday after a night of Israeli shelling on its outskirts, as Israelis launched a day of nationwide protests calling for hostages to be released and the war in Gaza to end.

news.title: No-spend September: 30 ways to cut your non-essential spending in 30 days
news.summary: No-spend challenges, which encourage people to go on a spending fast by abstaining from buying anything but the bare essentials, have been de rigueur on social media in recent years. But on TikTok, September has emerged as an especially popular month to embark on this personal finance trend.

news.title: Darragh McCullough: From losing €600 a week to outgrowing the cart – the coffee gamble that paid off
news.summary: It's harvest time, the fields are a riot, autumn planting is looming, and what am I doing? Fretting about a bloody coffee shop that's spiralling out of control. Although, calling it a shop might be a bit of an exaggeration, given that it is, in fact, a tarted-up horsebox I found on Done Deal.
